title: red bull font
content:
does anybody know what the font is for the red bull logo, and what type of font "einstein knows energy" is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107122812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/einstein1_3649.jpg)
author: tyler_6

comments.content: Looks to me like Futura with a special R & B. Anybody know different?
It's futura book with a stroke added for weight.
futura heavy for the logo, futura light for other type. done work for them. everythings futura.

I created the ad and can confirm that it is Futura. It was not done for Red Bull however. This was a student design project, [http://bit.ly/gHboHF](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107122812/http:/bit.ly/gHboHF "http://bit.ly/gHboHF")
